Configuration.startupLisp:
;(setj WorldObjects:MaintainCollisions true) (setj WorldObjects:MaintainCollisions false) (setj WorldObjects:MaintainEffects true) (setj WorldObjects:MaintainActions true) (setj WorldObjects:MaintainAnims true) (setj WorldObjects:MaintainSounds false) ;; for testing in a noisey world
;; just testing connections (setj WorldObjects:MaintainEffects false) (setj WorldObjects:MaintainActions false) (setj WorldObjects:MaintainAnims false) (setj WorldObjects:GleanAssetsFromFolders false) (setj WorldObjects:MaintainGroupMetaData false) (setj WorldObjects:MaintainObjectUpdates false) (setj WorldObjects:MaintainSimObjectInfoMap false) (setj WorldObjects:SendSimObjectInfoMap false) (setj WorldObjects:SendOnDataAspectUpdate false)
(setj GridAddress "https://login.agni.lindenlab.com/cgi-bin/login.cgi") (setj GridAddress "http://login.osgrid.org/") (setj GridAddress "OSGrid") ;; .. depends on grid.xml (setj GridAddress "agni") ;; .. depends on grid.xml
(setj GlobalPasswd "abc123")
(setj StartLoc "uri:last&173&51&38") (setj StartLoc "uri:Isabel&44&107&58") (setj StartLoc "uri:Fairyverse&115&125&21") (setj StartLoc "uri:MASA Group&115&125&21") (setj StartLoc "uri:Boardroom&128&125&29") (setj StartLoc "uri:MilSpecMoo&128&128&32")
'(setj StartLoc "uri:MilSpecMoo&72&135&38") '(setj StartLoc "uri:Diva Texture test&128&128&38") (setj StartLoc "uri:Wright Plaza&128&128&38") (setj StartLoc "uri:LBSA Plaza&128&128&38") (setj StartLoc "last") (setj StartLoc "Halca/128/128/38") (setj StartLoc "Penn State Isle 2/49/127/25") (setj StartLoc "Belphegor/152/41/63")
'(create-botclient "Nephrael" "Rae" GlobalPasswd "https://login.agni.lindenlab.com/cgi-bin/login.cgi" "uri:Fairyverse&115&125&21") '(create-botclient "Douglas" "Miles" GlobalPasswd GridAddress StartLoc) '(create-botclient "Nephrael" "Rae" GlobalPasswd GridAddress StartLoc ) '(create-botclient "Lisa" "Wooley" GlobalPasswd GridAddress StartLoc ) '(create-botclient "Cat" "Bot" GlobalPasswd GridAddress StartLoc ) '(create-botclient "Nephrael" "Rajesh" GlobalPasswd GridAddress StartLoc) (create-botclient "BinaBot" "Daxeline" "BinaPass" GridAddress StartLoc) '(create-botclient "Jon" "Doe" GlobalPasswd GridAddress StartLoc)
Configuration.startupClientLisp:
(thisClient.ExecuteCommand "debug Debug") (thisClient.ExecuteCommand "load CogbotRadegastPluginModule") ;;(thisClient.ExecuteCommand "load CycWorldModule") (thisClient.ExecuteCommand "load TheSimiansModule") (thisClient.ExecuteCommand "load AIMLBotModule.dll") (thisClient.ExecuteCommand "aiml @off") ;; makes the AIMLBotModule complete loading before moving on ;;(thisClient.ExecuteCommand "load IrcRegionModule") ;;(thisClient.ExecuteCommand "waitforlogin 120") ;; give user/system a chance to login before the script starts it
(thisClient.ExecuteCommand "login") ;; does the login if the user didnt press the button (thisClient.ExecuteCommand "waitforlogin 300") ;; wait for the auto-login (5 minutes)
Configuration.onLogin:
(thisClient.ExecuteCommand "waitforlogin 300") ;; makes sure we are really ready! ;; (thisClient.ExecuteCommand "teleport MilSpecMoo/128/128/31") ;; TP home (thisClient.ExecuteCommand (@"teleport {0}" StartLoc)) ;; TP To StartLocation
(thisClient.ExecuteCommand "thread setmaster Nephrael Rajesh") ;; change this to your name ;;(thisClient.ExecuteCommand "thread setmaster Douglas Miles") ;; change this to your name ;; (thisClient.ExecuteCommand "thread irc #logicmoo cogbotIRCModule irc.freenode.net") ;; to connect to IRC (thisClient.ExecuteCommand "aiml @on") ;; turns on/off aiml for all users ;;(thisClient.ExecuteCommand "appearance nobake") ;;(setj WorldObjectsForAimLBot:DefaultMaxRespondToChatPerMinute 20) ;; once every three seconds ;;(thisClient.ExecuteCommand "simbot start") ;; turns on/off Simian module thinker (thisClient.ExecuteCommand "appearance bake") (thisClient.ExecuteCommand "say I am logged in now!") ;;(thisClient.ExecuteCommand "Follow* Douglas Miles") ;;(thisClient.ExecuteCommand "Follow* $master")
(thisClient.ExecuteCommand "debug Info")
